name: Spam Destroyer
description:
You are the Spam Filter! Save the web by destroying the spam before it gets to the users by burning it!

Clicker Style Game
Made for Mini Jam 123: Web
There was a limitation of "There No Floor", emails are just  electrons flying through the ether!

How to Play:

Emails are sent from the computers on the left, flying across the ether to the computers on the right. Any   emails which are flashing red are spam,  and must be burnt before making it to the users.

Clicking on an email before it reaches it's destination will set it on fire, but be careful! You can set an entire stack of emails on fire  if they're overlapping.

---

Disclaimers:

This is a game jam game, and as such, may not be the most polished, free of bugs, or full featured as desired. It was coded from zero, and all assets (except for the fonts) were made within two days.

It was also the first time using Godot, so there was a learning curve there as well.

The entire goal of this was to join a jam and just make something! Learning some new tools along the way, and just have some fun!

Techy Details / Software & Hardware:

  • Graphics created in Gimp
  • Sounds created using an Arturia MicroBrute, and recorded with Audacity
  • Game engine is Godot

Special Thanks to the play testers for feedback during development!
